00014 //! \todo sub-sampling rate synchronization.
00015 
00016 #include "nidaqdso.h"
00017 
00018 #ifndef HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00019     #define DAQmx_Val_FallingSlope 0
00020     #define DAQmx_Val_RisingSlope 0
00021     #define DAQmx_Val_DigEdge 0
00022     #define DAQmxGetReadAvailSampPerChan(x,y) 0
00023 #endif //HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00024 
00025 #include <qmessagebox.h>
00026 #include <kmessagebox.h>
00027 #include "xwavengraph.h"
00028 
00029 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, NIDAQmxDSO, "National Instruments DAQ as DSO");
00030 
00031 #define TASK_UNDEF ((TaskHandle)-1)
00032 #define NUM_MAX_CH 2
00033 
00034 XNIDAQmxDSO::XNIDAQmxDSO(const char *name, bool runtime,
00035                          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00036                          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00037                          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00038                          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00039     XNIDAQmxDriver<XDSO>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00040     m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest(0),
00041     m_task(TASK_UNDEF)
00042 {
00043     recordLength()->value(2000);
00044     timeWidth()->value(1e-2);
00045     average()->value(1);
00046 
00047     const char* sc[] = {"0.4", "1", "2", "4", "10", "20", "40", "84", 0L};
00048     for(int i = 0; sc[i]; i++)
00049     {
00050         vFullScale1()->add(sc[i]);
00051         vFullScale2()->add(sc[i]);
00052         vFullScale3()->add(sc[i]);
00053         vFullScale4()->add(sc[i]);
00054     }
00055     vFullScale1()->value("20");
00056     vFullScale2()->value("20");
00057     vFullScale3()->value("20");
00058     vFullScale4()->value("20");
00059 
00060     if(g_bUseMLock) {
00061         const void *FIRST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER = &m_recordBuf;
00062         const void *LAST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER = &m_task;
00063         //Suppress swapping.
00064         mlock(FIRST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER, (size_t)LAST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER - (size_t)FIRST_OF_MLOCK_MEMBER);
00065     }
00066 
00067     vOffset1()->disable();
00068     vOffset2()->disable();
00069     vOffset3()->disable();
00070     vOffset4()->disable();
00071 }
00072 XNIDAQmxDSO::~XNIDAQmxDSO()
00073 {
00074     clearAcquision();
00075 }
00076 void
00077 XNIDAQmxDSO::onSoftTrigChanged(const shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger> &) {
00078     trigSource()->clear();
00079     XString series = interface()->productSeries();
00080     {
00081         char buf[2048];
00082         {
00083             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevAIPhysicalChans(interface()->devName(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00084             std::deque<XString> chans;
00085             XNIDAQmxInterface::parseList(buf, chans);
00086             for(std::deque<XString>::iterator it = chans.begin(); it != chans.end(); it++) {
00087                 trigSource()->add(it->c_str());
00088             }
00089         }
00090         //M series
00091         const char* sc_m[] = {
00092             "PFI0", "PFI1", "PFI2", "PFI3", "PFI4", "PFI5", "PFI6", "PFI7",
00093             "PFI8", "PFI9", "PFI10", "PFI11", "PFI12", "PFI13", "PFI14", "PFI15",
00094             "Ctr0InternalOutput", "Ctr1InternalOutput",
00095             "Ctr0Source",
00096             "Ctr0Gate",
00097             "Ctr1Source",
00098             "Ctr1Gate",
00099             "FrequencyOutput",
00100             0L};
00101         //S series
00102         const char* sc_s[] = {
00103             "PFI0", "PFI1", "PFI2", "PFI3", "PFI4", "PFI5", "PFI6", "PFI7",
00104             "PFI8", "PFI9",
00105             "Ctr0InternalOutput",
00106             "OnboardClock",
00107             "Ctr0Source",
00108             "Ctr0Gate",
00109             0L};
00110         const char **sc = sc_m;
00111         if(series == "S")
00112             sc = sc_s;
00113         for(const char**it = sc; *it; it++) {
00114             XString str(formatString("/%s/%s", interface()->devName(), *it));
00115             trigSource()->add(str);
00116         }
00117         atomic_shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList>
00118             list(XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::virtualTrigList());
00119         for(XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList_it
00120                 it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00121             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < (*it)->bits(); i++) {
00122                 trigSource()->add(
00123                     formatString("%s/line%d", (*it)->label(), i));
00124             }
00125         }
00126     }
00127 }
00128 void
00129 XNIDAQmxDSO::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00130 {
00131     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00132     m_running = false;
00133     char buf[2048];
00134     {
00135         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevAIPhysicalChans(interface()->devName(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00136         std::deque<XString> chans;
00137         XNIDAQmxInterface::parseList(buf, chans);
00138         for(std::deque<XString>::iterator it = chans.begin(); it != chans.end(); it++) {
00139             trace1()->add(it->c_str());
00140             trace2()->add(it->c_str());
00141             trace3()->add(it->c_str());
00142             trace4()->add(it->c_str());
00143         }
00144     }
00145     onSoftTrigChanged(shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger>());
00146 
00147     m_suspendRead = true;
00148     m_threadReadAI.reset(new XThread<XNIDAQmxDSO>(shared_from_this(),
00149                                                   &XNIDAQmxDSO::executeReadAI));
00150     m_threadReadAI->resume();
00151 
00152     this->start();
00153 
00154     m_lsnOnSoftTrigChanged = XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::onChange().connectWeak(
00155         shared_from_this(), &XNIDAQmxDSO::onSoftTrigChanged,
00156         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00157     createChannels();
00158 }
00159 void
00160 XNIDAQmxDSO::close() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00161 {
00162     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00163 
00164     m_lsnOnSoftTrigChanged.reset();
00165 
00166     clearAcquision();
00167 
00168     if(m_threadReadAI) {
00169         m_threadReadAI->terminate();
00170     }
00171 
00172     trace1()->clear();
00173     trace2()->clear();
00174     trace3()->clear();
00175     trace4()->clear();
00176 
00177     m_recordBuf.clear();
00178     m_record_av.clear();
00179 
00180     interface()->stop();
00181 }
00182 void
00183 XNIDAQmxDSO::clearAcquision() {
00184     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00185     m_suspendRead = true;
00186     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00187 
00188     try {
00189         disableTrigger();
00190     }
00191     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00192         e.print();
00193     }
00194 
00195     if(m_task != TASK_UNDEF) {
00196         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxClearTask(m_task));
00197     }
00198     m_task = TASK_UNDEF;
00199 }
00200 void
00201 XNIDAQmxDSO::disableTrigger()
00202 {
00203     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00204     m_suspendRead = true;
00205     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00206 
00207     if(m_running) {
00208         m_running = false;
00209         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00210     }
00211     if(m_task != TASK_UNDEF) {
00212         uInt32 num_ch;
00213         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskNumChans(m_task, &num_ch));
00214         if(num_ch) {
00215             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxDisableStartTrig(m_task));
00216             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxDisableRefTrig(m_task));
00217         }
00218     }
00219 
00220     m_preTriggerPos = 0;
00221     m_trigRoute.reset();
00222 
00223     //reset virtual trigger setup.
00224     if(m_softwareTrigger)
00225         m_softwareTrigger->disconnect();
00226     m_lsnOnSoftTrigStarted.reset();
00227     m_softwareTrigger.reset();
00228 }
00229 void
00230 XNIDAQmxDSO::setupTrigger()
00231 {
00232     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00233     m_suspendRead = true;
00234     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00235 
00236     unsigned int pretrig = lrint(*trigPos() / 100.0 * *recordLength());
00237     m_preTriggerPos = pretrig;
00238 
00239     XString atrig;
00240     XString dtrig;
00241     XString src = trigSource()->to_str();
00242 
00243     char buf[2048];
00244     {
00245         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevAIPhysicalChans(interface()->devName(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00246         std::deque<XString> chans;
00247         XNIDAQmxInterface::parseList(buf, chans);
00248         for(std::deque<XString>::iterator it = chans.begin(); it != chans.end(); it++) {
00249             if(src == *it)
00250                 atrig = *it;
00251         }
00252     }
00253     if(!atrig.length())
00254         dtrig = src;
00255 
00256     int32 trig_spec = *trigFalling() ? DAQmx_Val_FallingSlope : DAQmx_Val_RisingSlope;
00257 
00258     if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00259         dtrig = m_softwareTrigger->armTerm();
00260         trig_spec = DAQmx_Val_RisingSlope;
00261         pretrig = 0;
00262         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOverWrite(m_task, DAQmx_Val_OverwriteUnreadSamps));
00263     }
00264 
00265     //Small # of pretriggers is not allowed for ReferenceTrigger.
00266     if(!m_softwareTrigger && (pretrig < 2)) {
00267         pretrig = 0;
00268         m_preTriggerPos = pretrig;
00269     }
00270 
00271     if(!pretrig) {
00272         if(atrig.length()) {
00273             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00274                 DAQmxCfgAnlgEdgeStartTrig(m_task,
00275                                           atrig.c_str(), trig_spec, *trigLevel()));
00276         }
00277         if(dtrig.length()) {
00278             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00279                 DAQmxCfgDigEdgeStartTrig(m_task,
00280                                          dtrig.c_str(), trig_spec));
00281         }
00282     }
00283     else {
00284         if(atrig.length()) {
00285             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00286                 DAQmxCfgAnlgEdgeRefTrig(m_task,
00287                                         atrig.c_str(), trig_spec, *trigLevel(), pretrig));
00288         }
00289         if(dtrig.length()) {
00290             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00291                 DAQmxCfgDigEdgeRefTrig(m_task,
00292                                        dtrig.c_str(), trig_spec, pretrig));
00293         }
00294     }
00295 
00296     char ch[256];
00297     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskChannels(m_task, ch, sizeof(ch)));
00298     if(interface()->productFlags() & XNIDAQmxInterface::FLAG_BUGGY_DMA_AI) {
00299         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetAIDataXferMech(m_task, ch,
00300                                                DAQmx_Val_Interrupts));
00301     }
00302     if(interface()->productFlags() & XNIDAQmxInterface::FLAG_BUGGY_XFER_COND_AI) {
00303         uInt32 bufsize;
00304         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufInputOnbrdBufSize(m_task, &bufsize));
00305         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00306             DAQmxSetAIDataXferReqCond(m_task, ch,
00307                                       (m_softwareTrigger || (bufsize/2 < m_recordBuf.size())) ? DAQmx_Val_OnBrdMemNotEmpty :
00308                                       DAQmx_Val_OnBrdMemMoreThanHalfFull));
00309     }
00310 }
00311 void
00312 XNIDAQmxDSO::setupSoftwareTrigger()
00313 {
00314     XString src = trigSource()->to_str();
00315     //setup virtual trigger.
00316     atomic_shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList>
00317         list(XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::virtualTrigList());
00318     for(XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList_it
00319             it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00320         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < (*it)->bits(); i++) {
00321             if(src == formatString("%s/line%d", (*it)->label(), i)) {
00322                 m_softwareTrigger = *it;
00323                 m_softwareTrigger->connect(
00324                     !*trigFalling() ? (1uL << i) : 0,
00325                     *trigFalling() ? (1uL << i) : 0);
00326             }
00327         }
00328     }
00329 }
00330 void
00331 XNIDAQmxDSO::setupTiming()
00332 {
00333     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00334     m_suspendRead = true;
00335     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00336 
00337     if(m_running) {
00338         m_running = false;
00339         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00340     }
00341 
00342     uInt32 num_ch;
00343     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskNumChans(m_task, &num_ch));
00344     if(num_ch == 0) return;
00345 
00346     disableTrigger();
00347     setupSoftwareTrigger();
00348 
00349     const unsigned int len = *recordLength();
00350     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00351         DSORawRecord &rec = m_dsoRawRecordBanks[i];
00352         rec.record.resize(len * num_ch);
00353         ASSERT(rec.numCh == num_ch);
00354         if(g_bUseMLock) {
00355             mlock(&rec.record[0], rec.record.size() * sizeof(int32_t));
00356         }
00357     }
00358     m_recordBuf.resize(len * num_ch);
00359     if(g_bUseMLock) {
00360         mlock(&m_recordBuf[0], m_recordBuf.size() * sizeof(tRawAI));
00361     }
00362 
00363     uInt32 onbrd_size;
00364     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufInputOnbrdBufSize(m_task, &onbrd_size));
00365     fprintf(stderr, "Using on-brd bufsize=%d\n", (int)onbrd_size);
00366     unsigned int bufsize = len;
00367     if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00368         bufsize = std::max(bufsize * 8, (unsigned int)lrint((len / *timeWidth()) * 1.0));
00369         bufsize = std::max(bufsize, (unsigned int)onbrd_size);
00370     }
00371 
00372     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00373         DAQmxCfgSampClkTiming(m_task,
00374                               //! debug!
00375                               //        formatString("/%s/Ctr0InternalOutput", interface()->devName()),
00376                               NULL, // internal source
00377                               len / *timeWidth(),
00378                               DAQmx_Val_Rising,
00379                               !m_softwareTrigger ? DAQmx_Val_FiniteSamps : DAQmx_Val_ContSamps,
00380                               bufsize
00381                               ));
00382 
00383     interface()->synchronizeClock(m_task);
00384 
00385     {
00386         uInt32 size;
00387         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufInputBufSize(m_task, &size));
00388         fprintf(stderr, "Using buffer size of %d\n", (int)size);
00389         if(size != bufsize) {
00390             fprintf(stderr, "Try to modify buffer size from %d to %d\n", (int)size, (int)bufsize);
00391             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCfgInputBuffer(m_task, bufsize));
00392         }
00393     }
00394 
00395     float64 rate;
00396     //  CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetRefClkRate(m_task, &rate));
00397     //  dbgPrint(QString("Reference Clk rate = %1.").arg(rate));
00398     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetSampClkRate(m_task, &rate));
00399     m_interval = 1.0 / rate;
00400 
00401     setupTrigger();
00402     startSequence();
00403 }
00404 void
00405 XNIDAQmxDSO::createChannels()
00406 {
00407     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00408     m_suspendRead = true;
00409     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00410 
00411     clearAcquision();
00412 
00413     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateTask("", &m_task));
00414     ASSERT(m_task != TASK_UNDEF);
00415 
00416     if(*trace1() >= 0) {
00417         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00418             DAQmxCreateAIVoltageChan(m_task,
00419                                      trace1()->to_str().c_str(),
00420                                      "",
00421                                      DAQmx_Val_Cfg_Default,
00422                                      -atof(vFullScale1()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00423                                      atof(vFullScale1()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00424                                      DAQmx_Val_Volts,
00425                                      NULL
00426                                      ));
00427 
00428         //obtain range info.
00429         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++)
00430             m_coeffAI[0][i] = 0.0;
00431         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00432             DAQmxGetAIDevScalingCoeff(m_task,
00433                                       trace1()->to_str().c_str(),
00434                                       m_coeffAI[0], CAL_POLY_ORDER));
00435     }
00436     if(*trace2() >= 0) {
00437         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00438             DAQmxCreateAIVoltageChan(m_task,
00439                                      trace2()->to_str().c_str(),
00440                                      "",
00441                                      DAQmx_Val_Cfg_Default,
00442                                      -atof(vFullScale2()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00443                                      atof(vFullScale2()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00444                                      DAQmx_Val_Volts,
00445                                      NULL
00446                                      ));
00447         //obtain range info.
00448         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++)
00449             m_coeffAI[1][i] = 0.0;
00450         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetAIDevScalingCoeff(m_task,
00451                                                   trace2()->to_str().c_str(),
00452                                                   m_coeffAI[1], CAL_POLY_ORDER));
00453     }
00454     if(*trace3() >= 0) {
00455         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00456             DAQmxCreateAIVoltageChan(m_task,
00457                                      trace3()->to_str().c_str(),
00458                                      "",
00459                                      DAQmx_Val_Cfg_Default,
00460                                      -atof(vFullScale3()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00461                                      atof(vFullScale3()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00462                                      DAQmx_Val_Volts,
00463                                      NULL
00464                                      ));
00465         //obtain range info.
00466         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++)
00467             m_coeffAI[1][i] = 0.0;
00468         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetAIDevScalingCoeff(m_task,
00469                                                   trace3()->to_str().c_str(),
00470                                                   m_coeffAI[1], CAL_POLY_ORDER));
00471     }
00472     if(*trace4() >= 0) {
00473         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(
00474             DAQmxCreateAIVoltageChan(m_task,
00475                                      trace4()->to_str().c_str(),
00476                                      "",
00477                                      DAQmx_Val_Cfg_Default,
00478                                      -atof(vFullScale4()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00479                                      atof(vFullScale4()->to_str().c_str()) / 2.0,
00480                                      DAQmx_Val_Volts,
00481                                      NULL
00482                                      ));
00483         //obtain range info.
00484         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++)
00485             m_coeffAI[1][i] = 0.0;
00486         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetAIDevScalingCoeff(m_task,
00487                                                   trace4()->to_str().c_str(),
00488                                                   m_coeffAI[1], CAL_POLY_ORDER));
00489     }
00490 
00491     uInt32 num_ch;
00492     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskNumChans(m_task, &num_ch));
00493 
00494     //accumlation buffer.
00495     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00496         DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[i]);
00497         rec.acqCount = 0;
00498         rec.accumCount = 0;
00499         rec.numCh = num_ch;
00500     }
00501 
00502     if(num_ch == 0)  {
00503         return;
00504     }
00505 
00506     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxRegisterDoneEvent(m_task, 0, &XNIDAQmxDSO::_onTaskDone, this));
00507 
00508     setupTiming();
00509 }
00510 void
00511 XNIDAQmxDSO::clearStoredSoftwareTrigger() {
00512     uInt64 total_samps = 0;
00513     if(m_running)
00514         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadTotalSampPerChanAcquired(m_task, &total_samps));
00515     m_softwareTrigger->clear(total_samps, 1.0 / m_interval);
00516 }
00517 void
00518 XNIDAQmxDSO::onSoftTrigStarted(const shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger> &) {
00519     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00520     m_suspendRead = true;
00521     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00522 
00523     if(m_running) {
00524         m_running = false;
00525         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00526     }
00527 
00528     const DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest]);
00529     m_softwareTrigger->setBlankTerm(m_interval * rec.recordLength);
00530     fprintf(stderr, "Virtual trig start.\n");
00531 
00532     uInt32 num_ch;
00533     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskNumChans(m_task, &num_ch));
00534     if(num_ch > 0) {
00535         int32 type;
00536         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetStartTrigType(m_task, &type));
00537         if(type != DAQmx_Val_DigEdge) {
00538             setupTrigger();
00539         }
00540         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_task));
00541         m_suspendRead = false;
00542         m_running = true;
00543     }
00544 }
00545 int32
00546 XNIDAQmxDSO::_onTaskDone(TaskHandle task, int32 status, void *data) {
00547     XNIDAQmxDSO *obj = reinterpret_cast<XNIDAQmxDSO*>(data);
00548     obj->onTaskDone(task, status);
00549     return status;
00550 }
00551 void
00552 XNIDAQmxDSO::onTaskDone(TaskHandle /*task*/, int32 status) {
00553     if(status) {
00554         gErrPrint(getLabel() + XNIDAQmxInterface::getNIDAQmxErrMessage(status));
00555         m_suspendRead = true;
00556     }
00557 }
00558 void
00559 XNIDAQmxDSO::onForceTriggerTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00560 {
00561     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00562     m_suspendRead = true;
00563     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00564 
00565     if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00566         if(m_running) {
00567             uInt64 total_samps;
00568             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadTotalSampPerChanAcquired(m_task, &total_samps));
00569             m_softwareTrigger->forceStamp(total_samps, 1.0 / m_interval);
00570             m_suspendRead = false;
00571         }
00572     }
00573     else {
00574         disableTrigger();
00575         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_task));
00576         m_suspendRead = false;
00577         m_running = true;
00578     }
00579 }
00580 inline bool
00581 XNIDAQmxDSO::tryReadAISuspend(const atomic<bool> &terminated) {
00582     if(m_suspendRead) {
00583         m_readMutex.unlock();
00584         while(m_suspendRead && !terminated) usleep(30000);
00585         m_readMutex.lock();
00586         return true;
00587     }
00588     return false;
00589 }
00590 void *
00591 XNIDAQmxDSO::executeReadAI(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00592 {
00593     while(!terminated) {
00594         try {
00595             acquire(terminated);
00596         }
00597         catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00598             e.print(getLabel());
00599             m_suspendRead = true;
00600         }
00601     }
00602     return NULL;
00603 }
00604 void
00605 XNIDAQmxDSO::acquire(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00606 {
00607     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_readMutex);
00608     while(!terminated) {
00609 
00610         if(!m_running) {
00611             tryReadAISuspend(terminated);
00612             msecsleep(30);
00613             return;
00614         }
00615 
00616         uInt32 num_ch;
00617         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadNumChans(m_task, &num_ch));
00618         if(num_ch == 0) {
00619             tryReadAISuspend(terminated);
00620             msecsleep(30);
00621             return;
00622         }
00623 
00624         const DSORawRecord &old_rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest]);
00625         if(num_ch != old_rec.numCh)
00626             throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(i18n("Inconsistent channel number."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00627 
00628         const unsigned int size = m_recordBuf.size() / num_ch;
00629         const float64 freq = 1.0 / m_interval;
00630         unsigned int cnt = 0;
00631 
00632         if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00633             shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger> &vt(m_softwareTrigger);
00634 
00635             while(!terminated) {
00636                 if(tryReadAISuspend(terminated))
00637                     return;
00638                 uInt64 total_samps;
00639                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadTotalSampPerChanAcquired(m_task, &total_samps));
00640                 if(uint64_t lastcnt = vt->tryPopFront(total_samps, freq)) {
00641                     uInt32 bufsize;
00642                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetBufInputBufSize(m_task, &bufsize));
00643                     if(total_samps - lastcnt + m_preTriggerPos > bufsize * 4 / 5) {
00644                         gWarnPrint(i18n("Buffer Overflow."));
00645                         continue;
00646                     }
00647                     //set read pos.
00648                     int16 tmpbuf[NUM_MAX_CH];
00649                     int32 samps;
00650                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadRelativeTo(m_task, DAQmx_Val_MostRecentSamp));
00651                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, -1));
00652                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxReadBinaryI16(m_task, 1,
00653                                                        0, DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00654                                                        tmpbuf, NUM_MAX_CH, &samps, NULL
00655                                                        ));
00656                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadRelativeTo(m_task, DAQmx_Val_CurrReadPos));
00657                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, 0));
00658                     uInt64 curr_rdpos;
00659                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadCurrReadPos(m_task, &curr_rdpos));
00660                     int32 offset = lastcnt - m_preTriggerPos - curr_rdpos;
00661                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, offset));
00662                     //                  fprintf(stderr, "hit! %d %d %d\n", (int)offset, (int)lastcnt, (int)m_preTriggerPos);
00663                     break;
00664                 }
00665                 usleep(lrint(1e6 * size * m_interval / 6));
00666             }
00667         }
00668         else {
00669             if(m_preTriggerPos) {
00670                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadRelativeTo(m_task, DAQmx_Val_FirstPretrigSamp));
00671             }
00672             else {
00673                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadRelativeTo(m_task, DAQmx_Val_FirstSample));
00674             }
00675 
00676             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, 0));
00677         }
00678         if(terminated)
00679             return;
00680 
00681         const unsigned int num_samps = std::min(size, 8192u);
00682         for(; cnt < size;) {
00683             int32 samps;
00684             samps = std::min(size - cnt, num_samps);
00685             while(!terminated) {
00686                 if(tryReadAISuspend(terminated))
00687                     return;
00688                 uInt32 space;
00689                 int ret = DAQmxGetReadAvailSampPerChan(m_task, &space);
00690                 if(!ret && (space >= (uInt32)samps))
00691                     break;
00692                 usleep(lrint(1e6 * (samps - space) * m_interval));
00693             }
00694             if(terminated)
00695                 return;
00696             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxReadBinaryI16(m_task, samps,
00697                                                0.0, DAQmx_Val_GroupByScanNumber,
00698                                                &m_recordBuf[cnt * num_ch], samps * num_ch, &samps, NULL
00699                                                ));
00700             cnt += samps;
00701             if(!m_softwareTrigger) {
00702                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, cnt));
00703             }
00704             else {
00705                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, 0));
00706             }
00707         }
00708 
00709         const unsigned int av = *average();
00710         const bool sseq = *singleSequence();
00711         //obtain unlocked bank.
00712         int bank;
00713         for(;;) {
00714             bank = 1 - m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest;
00715             if(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank].tryLock())
00716                 break;
00717             bank = m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest;
00718             if(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank].tryLock())
00719                 break;
00720         }
00721         writeBarrier();
00722         ASSERT((bank >= 0) && (bank < 2));
00723         DSORawRecord &new_rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank]);
00724         unsigned int accumcnt = old_rec.accumCount;
00725 
00726         if(!sseq || (accumcnt < av)) {
00727             if(!m_softwareTrigger) {
00728                 if(m_running) {
00729                     m_running = false;
00730                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00731                 }
00732                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_task));
00733                 m_running = true;
00734             }
00735         }
00736 
00737         cnt = std::min(cnt, old_rec.recordLength);
00738         new_rec.recordLength = cnt;
00739         //  num_ch = std::min(num_ch, old_rec->numCh);
00740         new_rec.numCh = num_ch;
00741         const unsigned int bufsize = new_rec.recordLength * num_ch;
00742         tRawAI *pbuf = &m_recordBuf[0];
00743         const int32_t *pold = &old_rec.record[0];
00744         int32_t *paccum = &new_rec.record[0];
00745         //for optimization.
00746         unsigned int div = bufsize / 4;
00747         unsigned int rest = bufsize % 4;
00748         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < div; i++) {
00749             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00750             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00751             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00752             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00753         }
00754         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < rest; i++)
00755             *paccum++ = *pold++ + *pbuf++;
00756         new_rec.acqCount = old_rec.acqCount + 1;
00757         accumcnt++;
00758 
00759         while(!sseq && (av <= m_record_av.size()) && !m_record_av.empty())  {
00760             int32_t *paccum = &(new_rec.record[0]);
00761             tRawAI *psub = &(m_record_av.front()[0]);
00762             unsigned int div = bufsize / 4;
00763             unsigned int rest = bufsize % 4;
00764             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < div; i++) {
00765                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00766                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00767                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00768                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00769             }
00770             for(unsigned int i = 0; i < rest; i++)
00771                 *paccum++ -= *psub++;
00772             m_record_av.pop_front();
00773             accumcnt--;
00774         }
00775         new_rec.accumCount = accumcnt;
00776         // substitute the record with the working set.
00777         m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest = bank;
00778         writeBarrier();
00779         new_rec.unlock();
00780         if(!sseq) {
00781             m_record_av.push_back(m_recordBuf);
00782         }
00783         if(sseq && (accumcnt >= av))  {
00784             if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00785                 if(m_running) {
00786                     m_suspendRead = true;
00787                 }
00788             }
00789         }
00790     }
00791 }
00792 void
00793 XNIDAQmxDSO::startSequence()
00794 {
00795     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00796     m_suspendRead = true;
00797     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock2(m_readMutex);
00798 
00799     {
00800         m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest = 0;
00801         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00802             DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[i]);
00803             rec.acqCount = 0;
00804             rec.accumCount = 0;
00805         }
00806         DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[0]);
00807         if(!rec.numCh)
00808             return;
00809         rec.recordLength = rec.record.size() / rec.numCh;
00810         memset(&rec.record[0], 0, rec.record.size() * sizeof(int32_t));
00811     }
00812     m_record_av.clear();
00813 
00814     if(m_softwareTrigger) {
00815         if(!m_lsnOnSoftTrigStarted)
00816             m_lsnOnSoftTrigStarted = m_softwareTrigger->onStart().connectWeak(
00817                 shared_from_this(), &XNIDAQmxDSO::onSoftTrigStarted);
00818         if(m_running) {
00819             clearStoredSoftwareTrigger();
00820             m_suspendRead = false;
00821         }
00822         else {
00823             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxTaskControl(m_task, DAQmx_Val_Task_Commit));
00824             statusPrinter()->printMessage(i18n("Restart the software-trigger source."));
00825         }
00826     }
00827     else {
00828         if(m_running) {
00829             m_running = false;
00830             if(m_task != TASK_UNDEF)
00831                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStopTask(m_task));
00832         }
00833         uInt32 num_ch;
00834         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetTaskNumChans(m_task, &num_ch));
00835         if(num_ch > 0) {
00836             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxStartTask(m_task));
00837             m_suspendRead = false;
00838             m_running = true;
00839         }
00840     }
00841     //  CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetReadOffset(m_task, 0));
00842 }
00843 
00844 int
00845 XNIDAQmxDSO::acqCount(bool *seq_busy)
00846 {
00847     const DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest]);
00848     *seq_busy = ((unsigned int)rec.acqCount < *average());
00849     return rec.acqCount;
00850 }
00851 
00852 double
00853 XNIDAQmxDSO::getTimeInterval()
00854 {
00855     return m_interval;
00856 }
00857 
00858 inline float64
00859 XNIDAQmxDSO::aiRawToVolt(const float64 *pcoeff, float64 raw)
00860 {
00861     float64 x = 1.0;
00862     float64 y = 0.0;
00863     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++) {
00864         y += *(pcoeff++) * x;
00865         x *= raw;
00866     }
00867     return y;
00868 }
00869 
00870 void
00871 XNIDAQmxDSO::getWave(std::deque<XString> &)
00872 {
00873     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00874 
00875     int bank;
00876     for(;;) {
00877         bank = m_dsoRawRecordBankLatest;
00878         if(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank].tryLock())
00879             break;
00880         bank = 1 - bank;
00881         if(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank].tryLock())
00882             break;
00883     }
00884     readBarrier();
00885     ASSERT((bank >= 0) && (bank < 2));
00886     DSORawRecord &rec(m_dsoRawRecordBanks[bank]);
00887 
00888     if(rec.accumCount == 0) {
00889         rec.unlock();
00890         throw XDriver::XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00891     }
00892     const uInt32 num_ch = rec.numCh;
00893     const uInt32 len = rec.recordLength;
00894 
00895     char buf[2048];
00896     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetReadChannelsToRead(m_task, buf, sizeof(buf)));
00897 
00898     push((uint32_t)num_ch);
00899     push((uint32_t)m_preTriggerPos);
00900     push((uint32_t)len);
00901     push((uint32_t)rec.accumCount);
00902     push((double)m_interval);
00903     for(unsigned int ch = 0; ch < num_ch; ch++) {
00904         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++) {
00905             push((double)m_coeffAI[ch][i]);
00906         }
00907     }
00908     const int32_t *p = &(rec.record[0]);
00909     std::vector<char> &raw_data(rawData());
00910     const unsigned int size = len * num_ch;
00911     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00912         push(*p++, raw_data);
00913     XString str(buf);
00914     rawData().insert(rawData().end(), str.begin(), str.end());
00915     str = ""; //reserved/
00916     rawData().insert(rawData().end(), str.begin(), str.end());
00917 
00918     rec.unlock();
00919 }
00920 void
00921 XNIDAQmxDSO::convertRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00922 {
00923     const unsigned int num_ch = pop<uint32_t>();
00924     const unsigned int pretrig = pop<uint32_t>();
00925     const unsigned int len = pop<uint32_t>();
00926     const unsigned int accumCount = pop<uint32_t>();
00927     const double interval = pop<double>();
00928 
00929     setParameters(num_ch, - (double)pretrig * interval, interval, len);
00930 
00931     double *wave[NUM_MAX_CH];
00932     float64 coeff[NUM_MAX_CH][CAL_POLY_ORDER];
00933     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < num_ch; j++) {
00934         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < CAL_POLY_ORDER; i++) {
00935             coeff[j][i] = pop<double>();
00936         }
00937 
00938         wave[j] = waveDisp(j);
00939     }
00940 
00941     std::vector<char>::iterator &raw_data_it(rawDataPopIterator());
00942     const float64 prop = 1.0 / accumCount;
00943     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00944         for(unsigned int j = 0; j < num_ch; j++)
00945             *(wave[j])++ = aiRawToVolt(coeff[j], pop<int32_t>(raw_data_it) * prop);
00946     }
00947 }
